protocol_name: Degenerated PCR with GoTaq Hot Start
protocol_name_html: Degenerated PCR with GoTaq Hot Start
description: Degenerated PCR to test Y-linkage of genes in several Drosophila species. The reactions are made separately for males and females of 400 species and subspecies of Drosophila and related genera.
protocol_affiliation: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro
affiliation: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

authors_list.name: Eduardo Dupim
authors_list.affiliation: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

authors_list.name: Antonio Bernardo de Carvalho
authors_list.affiliation: Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"226ka","text":"Usually, we performing PCR tests in large-scale, testing several DNA samples from different species at once. We prepared a pre-mix stock to economy time in PCR experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c3ge6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cm7co","text":"   Reagent 1 reaction 1000 reactions   DEPC-Treated Water 11.6 uL 11.6mL   5x Green GoTaq Flexi Buffer 4.0 uL 4.0 mL   MgCl2 25mM 2.0 uL 2.0 mL   dNTP 10mM 0.4 uL 0.4 mL   TOTAL VOLUME 18 uL 18 mL   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":3,"length":7,"style":"bold"},{"offset":11,"length":10,"style":"bold"},{"offset":22,"length":14,"style":"bold"},{"offset":123,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":199,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"7bal5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"flskt","text":"We divide the pre-mix solution in 1 mL aliquots and stocked at -20\u00baC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"colWidths":[20,20,20],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23],"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":""},"data":[["<strong>Reagent<\/strong>","<strong>1 reaction<\/strong>","<strong>1000 reactions<\/strong>"],["DEPC-Treated Water","11.6 uL","11.6mL"],["5x Green GoTaq Flexi Buffer","4.0 uL","4.0 mL"],["MgCl<sub>2<\/sub> 25mM","2.0 uL","2.0 mL"],["dNTP 10mM","0.4 uL","0.4 mL"],["TOTAL VOLUME","18 uL","18 mL"]],"mergeCells":[],"guid":"A3DFBEF0B72611E88916D1DB482D0BED","show_headers":true}}],"guid":"D3E2114EFE374FC9840F075CB911B7B3","id":658591,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Pre-Mix Preparation"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ab48r","text":"Normally, the DNA template concentration is 10 ug/uL or higher.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"68cne","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"61lpr","text":" Reagent 1 reaction (20.1 uL) Template 1 uL Forward degenerated primer 40mM 0.5 uL Reverse degenerated primer 40mM 0.5 uL Premix 18 uL GoTaq Hot Start Polymerase 0.1 uL ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":4,"length":7,"style":"bold"},{"offset":15,"length":10,"style":"bold"},{"offset":27,"length":9,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":11,"key":0},{"offset":12,"length":13,"key":0},{"offset":26,"length":10,"key":0},{"offset":37,"length":153,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"colWidths":[null,null],"rowHeights":[],"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":""},"data":[["Reagent ","1 reaction (20.1 uL) "],["Template","1 uL"],["Forward degenerated primer 40mM","0.5 uL"],["Reverse degenerated primer 40mM","0.5 uL"],["Premix","18 uL"],["GoTaq Hot Start Polymerase","0.1 uL"]],"mergeCells":[],"guid":"A3E16CA0B72611E88916D1DB482D0BED","show_headers":true}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67rgb","text":"We used different thermocyle programs, according to the primers. In all programs, the GoTaq Hot Start Polymerase was previous incubated for 2 minutes to be activated. The PCRs were performed in a Applied Biosystems Veriti™ 96-Well Thermal Cycler (Cat#4375786).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6fa2a","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"37qrd","text":"1) Degenerated PCR Program: Differently of the normal PCR thermocycler programs, the degenerated PCR have more time for annealing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":28,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5jkas","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bcbnd","text":" cycles Denaturation Annealing Polymerization 1x 95ºC, 2:00 min --- --- 40x 95º, 0:30 min xºC, 1:30 min 72ºC, 1:00 min /1000 pb of template 1x --- --- 72ºC, 7:00 min ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":3,"length":6,"style":"bold"},{"offset":11,"length":12,"style":"bold"},{"offset":26,"length":9,"style":"bold"},{"offset":36,"length":14,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":23,"key":0},{"offset":24,"length":155,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"a9qcu","text":"xºC = optimal annealing temperature for the pair of primers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"91md6","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1ei3","text":"2) Degenerated Touchdown PCR (TD-PCR) Program: In TD-PCR, we screen a range of annealing temperatures to try optimize the reaction in different species samples. So, we have a stage where the annealing temperature decrease -0.2ºC by cycle, in the end of this stage, the annealing temperature decreased -4ºC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":47,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1kkft","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fgmod","text":" cycles Denaturation Annealing Polymerization 1x 95ºC, 2:00 min --- --- 20x 95º, 0:30 min XºC, 1:30 (Δ -0.2ºC by cycle) 72ºC, 1:00 min /1000 pb of template 25x 95º, 0:30 min xºC, 0:30 min 72ºC, 1:00 min /1000 pb of template 1x --- --- 72ºC, 7:00 min ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":3,"length":6,"style":"bold"},{"offset":11,"length":12,"style":"bold"},{"offset":26,"length":9,"style":"bold"},{"offset":36,"length":14,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":23,"key":1},{"offset":24,"length":105,"key":1},{"offset":130,"length":138,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7leh0","text":"xºC = optimal annealing temperature for the pair of primers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eo329","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5n31e","text":"References:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":11,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5nsec","text":"Sambrook, J. & Russell, D. W. (2001) 'Chapter 8. Protocol 11. Mixed Oligonucleotide-primed Amplification of cDNA' in Molecular cloning : a laboratory manual. Cold Spring Harbor: Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory, p. 8.66-8.71.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":117,"length":41,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"colWidths":[20,20,20,20],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23],"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","3_3":""},"data":[["cycles","Denaturation ","Annealing","Polymerization"],["1x","95ºC, 2:00 min","---","---"],["40x","95º, 0:30 min","xºC, 1:30 min","72ºC, 1:00 min /1000 pb of template"],["1x","---","---","72ºC, 7:00 min"]],"mergeCells":[],"guid":"A3E38F80B72611E88916D1DB482D0BED","show_headers":true}},{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"colWidths":[20,20,20,20],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23],"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","3_3":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","4_3":""},"data":[["cycles","Denaturation ","Annealing","Polymerization"],["1x","95ºC, 2:00 min","---","---"],["20x","95º, 0:30 min","XºC, 1:30 (Δ -0.2ºC by cycle) ","72ºC, 1:00 min /1000 pb of template"],["25x","95º, 0:30 min","xºC, 0:30 min","72ºC, 1:00 min /1000 pb of template"],["1x","---","---","72ºC, 7:00 min"]],"mergeCells":[],"guid":"A3E3DDA0B72611E88916D1DB482D0BED","show_headers":true}}],"guid":"C7677807A8EC4CDBA6A5809D944DE94D","id":659329,"previous_id":658597,"previous_guid":"AC7ED1F7FBC848F1B0A7A9387B02B37F","section":"PCR Programs"}
